title: Alberto Barenghi
text: Alberto Barenghi (2 May 1930 – 18 November 2002) was an Argentine <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201952%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Flyweight">men's flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>.
